#  Level 5 overview{#xlevel5}

To whet your appetite for some advanced analysis, [here](https://causalmap.app/gallery) are some of the variety of maps you can create with Causal Map.



In the pages in this section you will learn how to do advanced analysis in Causal Map: 

- using the filter buttons 
- using the advanced editor
- and lots more.

When you've read the pages, try the [quiz](https://causalmap.shinyapps.io/quizzes/#section-xlevel5) to see if you have understood enough or need to review some things!
